transArray.content: The hotel has a good location and is convenient for travel. The hotel breakfast is rich, the room is clean and tidy, and the front desk service is friendly. It is a good choice for business travel.

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for your 5-point review! Every city always has its reasons for people to miss it, every season has its scenery that we canâ€™t leave behind, and every hotel has its sweet and warm memories. I hope Xiaoji will be the warmest and most unique one in your memories. !
